00039 namespace Hypertable {
00040 
00044   class  NoTimeLayout : public log4cpp::Layout {
00045   public:
00046     NoTimeLayout() { }
00047     virtual ~NoTimeLayout() { }
00048     virtual std::string format(const log4cpp::LoggingEvent& event) {
00049       std::ostringstream message;
00050       const String& pri_name = log4cpp::Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority);
00051       message << pri_name << " " << event.categoryName << " " << event.ndc << ": " << event.message << std::endl;
00052       return message.str();
00053     }
00054   };
00055 
00056   class TestHarness {
00057   public:
00058     TestHarness(const char *name) {
00059 
00060       m_name = name;
00061 
00062       Logger::initialize(name);
00063 
00064       // open temporary output file
00065       sprintf(m_output_file, "%s%d", name, getpid());
00066 
00067       if ((m_fd = open(m_output_file, O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_WRONLY, 0644)) < 0) {
00068         HT_ERRORF("open(%s) failed - %s", m_output_file, strerror(errno));
00069         exit(1);
00070       }
00071 
00072       m_log_stream.open(m_output_file);
00073 
00074       Logger::logger->removeAllAppenders();
00075       m_appender = new log4cpp::FileAppender((String)name, m_fd);
00076       m_appender->setLayout(new NoTimeLayout());
00077       Logger::logger->setAppender(m_appender);
00078     }
00079     ~TestHarness() {
00080       unlink(m_output_file);
00081     }
00082 
00083     int get_log_file_descriptor() { return m_fd; }
00084 
00085     std::ostream &get_log_stream() { return m_log_stream; }
00086 
00087     void validate_and_exit(const char *golden_file) {
00088       int exitval = 0;
00089       m_log_stream << std::flush;
00090       String command = (String)"diff " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00091       if (system(command.c_str()))
00092         exitval = 1;
00093       if (exitval == 0)
00094         unlink(m_output_file);
00095       else
00096         std::cerr << "Diff Error:  " << command << std::endl;
00097       exit(exitval);
00098     }
00099 
00100     void regenerate_golden_file(const char *golden_file) {
00101       String command = (String)"cp " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00102       system(command.c_str());
00103     }
00104 
00105     void clear_output() {
00106       if (!m_appender->reopen()) {
00107         HT_ERRORF("Problem re-opening logging output file %s", m_output_file);
00108         display_error_and_exit();
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00112     void display_error_and_exit() {
00113       m_log_stream << std::flush;
00114       std::cerr << "Error, see '" << m_output_file << "'" << std::endl;
00115       /*
00116       string command = (string)"cat " + m_output_file;
00117       system(command.c_str());
00118       unlink(m_output_file);
00119       */
00120       exit(1);
00121     }
00122 
00123   private:
00124     char m_output_file[128];
00125     log4cpp::FileAppender *m_appender;
00126     const char *m_name;
00127     int m_fd;
00128     std::ofstream m_log_stream;
00129   };
